project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of a program to help finance the development, over a period of 5 years, of new or improved market facilities in Mysore. The facilities to be provided include access roads, auction platforms, fencing, buildings, traders' shop-cum-godowns, internal roadways, parking areas, utilities and ancillary equipment. The project will also provide for training of marketing personnel and for project evaluation.
